About.Name: Fassih Ahmad Khan
About.AboutText: A Software Engineer and Tier 2 Network Analyst with several years of professional experience. A perfectionist with a diverse skill set dedicated to delivering streamlined and quality work, specializing in troubleshooting, problem-solving, coordination, and leadership.

Experience.EmploymentText: Computer Infrastructure Engineering and Troubleshooting at Seattle Pacific University.
